lines.i: Information on whether or not the infant was transferred within 24 hours of delivery.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.29"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code
The code value indicates the observation refers to the transfer of an infant.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type BL
A Boolean value to indicate whether or not the infant was transferred within 24 hours of delivery.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] participant
If the infant has been transferred, the name of the facility is collected - if it is known.
This participant SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="DST"
This participant SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] participantRole
This participantRole SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] @classCode="SDLOC"
This participantRole SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] scopingEntity
This scopingEntity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="ORG"
This scopingEntity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @determinerCode="INSTANCE"
This scopingEntity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] name
The name of the facility the infant was transferred to.
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code
The code value indicates the observation refers to the transfer of an infant.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type BL
A Boolean value to indicate whether or not the infant was transferred within 24 hours of delivery.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] participant
If the infant has been transferred, the name of the facility is collected - if it is known.
This participant SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="DST"
This participant SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] participantRole
This participantRole SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] @classCode="SDLOC"
This participantRole SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] scopingEntity
This scopingEntity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="ORG"
This scopingEntity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @determinerCode="INSTANCE"
This scopingEntity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] name
The name of the facility the infant was transferred to.

body.codeblock: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <observation xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" xsi:schemaLocation="urn:hl7-org:v3 CDA.xsd"> <id root="MDHT" extension="1077624055"/> <code code="127683965"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2013"/> <high value="2013"/> </effectiveTime> <value xsi:type="BL"/> <participant typeCode="DST"> <participantRole classCode="SDLOC"/> </participant> </observation>
